This repository contains the full code and workflow required to generate kmz files from gopro Max equirectangular images. To use it please clone the repository and then open the goproMaxStills2KmzConverter.qmd file (quarto must be installed).

A web version of is available [here](https://nunzioknerr.github.io/pannotator_collect/)
